name: LaunchKit
author: 1WD LLC

sections.description:
This Plugin is specifically designed to be used with the LaunchKit Newsletter & Free Demo Sites

  • To subscribe and receive your free and ready-to-use demo site with step-by-step instructions, CLICK HERE

Ready To Use WooCommerce Site Solutions For Online Business

LaunchKit makes it possible for anyone get up and running with a fully functional WordPess business site in just a few minutes.

LaunchKit offers powerful features using the best-in-class free plugins from the WordPress repository by connecting them together in ways that are otherwise not possible.

These features include:

  • Membership
  • Marketing Automation
  • eCommerce
  • Sales Funnels
  • Learning Management

With just one click you can be up and running with a fully functional business site based on LaunchKit.

Instead of fighting Frankenstein Monsters of your own creation, or trying to resist the urge to chase every shiny ball, we provide you an instant “win” via a stack of free WordPress components, held together with our “secret sauce” LaunchKit plugin.

Now you can start your paid membership site, or that of your client, using LaunchKit as the base. Everything will start out being fully functional, with all free and tested components. This eliminates all confusion and anxiety about first steps.

License

LaunchKit is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
the Free Software Foundation, either version 2 of the License, or
any later version.

LaunchKit is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
GNU General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
along with LaunchKit.

LaunchKit Features

These are just some of the features that LaunchKit provides in order to create a powerful business solution from other free plugins in the WordPress respository:

  • Change Checkout Button Text

This makes is easy for you to customize the checkout Call To Action to suit whatever type of products or services you are offering. For example “subscribe-now” instead of “Place Order”

  • Change Checkout Layout Into One Column

By default, and with no other changes, this offers a demonstrable improvement in conversion rates as compared with the default two-column layout of WooCommerce.

  • Display Checkout Even When No Products In Cart

This allows the WooCommerce checkout to be used as a combination of cart and checkout page, so that all products can be sent directly to the checkout page. Less steps equal greater conversion.

  • Redirect To Checkout After Adding Any Product To Cart

Many Sales Funnels work best if the buyers are forced to purchase immediately after clicking on a product add-to-cart button instead of remaining on the product or shop page.

  • Hide “View Cart” Notice After Products Added To Cart

This removes distracting notices that are no longer necessary when you are able to immediately direct anyone to the checkout page after they select a product to purchase.

  • Allow Only One Product In Checkout At A Time

Many Sales Funnels work best by offering buyers a choice of this or that instead of allowing them to purchase multiple items at once. Now you have that control at your fingertips!

  • Add Removal Link To Any Products In Checkout

Instead of requiring a buyer to bounce between the cart and the checkout, LaunchKit makes it possible to review any order and remove any items from right on the checkout page itelf, improving conversions.

  • Use Email For Username With User Registration

LaunchKit provides a proven method for avoiding spammers and scammers. By forcing usernames to be the same as the email, you will have no troubles matching orders or on-site behavior to the proper user. It also prevents users from creating silly or inappropriate usernames.

  • Instantly Register, Log-In & Redirect New User From Any Page with [wplk-registration] shortcode

This feature is the best way to onboard new users to your site and contacts to your FluentCRM in order to begin their journey through your sales funnel. A new contact is registered (as a user), logged-in, provided with an optional CRM tag, and redirected to their my-account page with just one click.

  • Use First & Last Names With User Registration

LaunchKit provides a powerful “Instant Registration” option that is the fastest way to onboard new users to your Sales Funnels. This option allows you to also collect First & Last Names in addition to email.

  • Disable Kadence Theme Checkout Field Colors

To avoid the distraction or confusion caused by the red and green field outlines added for validation by Kadence when a buyer is immediately sent to a fresh checkout page, simply disable with this option.

  • Add A Global Thank You Page To WooCommerce

This provides an enourmous improvement in customer satisfaction and post-purchase understanding of what to do “next”. LaunchKit provides a global thank you page to WooCommerce for any checkout.

  • Adds Three Custom Redirection URLs after products purchased with matching categories (wplk1, wplk2, wplk3)

In addition to the global thank you page, LaunchKit also provides three custom redirection functions so that you can have instant Sales Funnels after purchasing any product with the matching category (ie: wplk category product redirects to thank you page with /wplk1 url)

Custom Functions

  • Name Your Price By Adding &donation=xxxx to any url (where xxxx is donation amount)

An incredibly powerful way to take donations, instant payments or even to modify the price of an existing product for a specific customer

  • Empty WooCommerce Cart By Adding ?emptycart=yes to any url

Simply add this url to any button, typically on the bottom of the checkout page, to provide the most convenient way to empty all products from the cart before selecting new choices.

  • Remove Any Product From Cart By Adding ?remove-product=xxxx to any url (where xxxx is product id)

This function is a powerful way to create instant Sales Funnel journeys by removing one product as you are redirecting someone to another url or even if you are adding another product to the checkout at the same time.

  • Add WooCommerce Coupon Code By Adding ?wplkcoupon=xxxx to any url (where xxxx is coupon code)

The power of WooCommerce coupons are brought to any clickable button or link by way of this simple url string. Simply create your coupon then add this syntax with the coupon id to any link and it will apply automatically. Easy!

  • Add A Quick “Bundle” Of Multiple Products By Separating Each ID With A Comma ?add-to-cart=123,456

Instead of complicated and bloated plugins, you can use this “instant bundle” option of LaunchKit to send multiple products to the checkout with just one click. Perfect when you are offering sales or combination offers.
sections.installation: Upload and activate the plugin, then go to the LaunchKit tab in the admin dashboard. There you can configure your global settings.
sections.faq:
Where can I find LaunchKit documentation and more info?

You can learn more about LaunchKit on our website at https://wplaunchify.com/launchkit

What plugins or themes can I use with LaunchKit?

You can use any plugin or theme you wish. However, we highly recommend you follow our demo site and documenation to START with the core plugins and themes in our LaunchKit Demo sites. Why? Because this shows you how to have a common starting point with all the powerful features, yet not rely upon any premium 3rd party plugins or themes, or even add-on Gutenberg blocks. Once you’ve accomplishes your initial setup, you can then add “only” what you really need, and avoid building a Frankenstein Monster or adding every shiny new ball you see 😉

What plugins are important to use with LaunchKit?

While you can substitute out many types of free plugins for others, such as one LMS for another, there are some really key plugins to use in order to achieve the results we offer in our free LaunchKit Demo Sites. We encourage you to launch your own free Demo Site to explore and learn more about what works for your particular needs.

Do I need to use a page builder with LaunchKit?

No. The primary purpose of LaunchKit is to demonstrate how one can achieve a powerful business solution using only a free theme and the core Gutenberg blocks. However, if you WANT to add your favorite page builder, of course you can! The idea it to start with LESS and then add only what you want or need, instead of being overwhelmed at the start.

How many Sales Funnels can I make with LaunchKit?

LaunchKit provides one instant registration flow and three custom product flows, with no configuration required. If you feel you want more features or complete control over unlimited funnels, custom checkout and product layouts and more, then you may consider upgrading to our LaunchFlows plugin. Even without an upgrade, however, you will be able to achieve the four most popular and necessary sales funnels required: LeadMagnet Onboarding (Instant Registration), Tripwire Product, Sample Product, Full Product

How makes LaunchKit different from other plugins in the WordPress respository?

LaunchKit acts like the “secret sauce” that takes the feature-limited capabilities of popular and powerful free plugins in the respository and combines them into a fully-functional solution when you follow our step-by-step instructions or use our free LaunchKit Demo Sites. This means that most people can achieve a fully functional business solution in minutes before spending a dime on upgrading to the paid versions. This helps one to clarify exactly which, if any, of the plugins should be upgraded, and in many cases the answer will be “none.”

What gateways do LaunchKit support?

LaunchKit works with ANY gateway that is compatible with WooCommerce. It does not change or modify WooCommerce in that regard. In our free LaunchKit Demo Sites we include free test-configurations for the most popular Stripe and PayPal so that you don’t even need to configure those in order to see how all the Sales Funnels and automations work! Once you are ready to setup your own business, simply enable whichever gateways you prefer and/or connect your own Stripe or PayPal accounts.

What kinds of Sales Funnels can I create with LaunchKit?

With LaunchKit you are not limited in any way. You can sell any type of product or service or lead generation you like, and use the power of WooCommerce for one time, subscription, bundle, discounted, variable products and more.

This includes but is not limited to:
* Product Funnels
* Course Funnels
* Services Funnels
* Event Funnels
* Leadmagnet Funnels
* Webinar Funnels
* Video Content Funnels
* Newsletter Funnels
sections.changelog:
10-13-2022 – version 1.0.8
* Tweak – css to hide sales banners in wc my account dash wbcom

08-05-2022 – version 1.0.7
* Tweak – updated highlighting of plugin description

08-05-2022 – version 1.0.6
* Tweak – updated styles and descriptions

07-31-2022 – version 1.0.5
* Tweak – updated admin style and version number tracking

07-26-2022 – version 1.0.4
* Tweak – updated admin css to include plugin page style options

07-24-2022 – version 1.0.3
* Tweak – updated launchkit.php to correct callback names for admin sections

07-18-2022 – version 1.0.2
* Feature – added option to change admin email without confirmation email
* Feature – added option to remove wplk1 tag and redirect to /cancel-wplk1 page if wplk1 subscription cancelled
* Tweak – adjusted css for one column checkout

07-10-2022 – version 1.0.1
* Feature – added custom thank you redirection for three pages with matching product categories (wplk1, wplk3, wplk3)
* Tweak – added custom css for Blocky theme for one column wc checkout

07-04-2022 – version 1.0.1
* First Release!
